case.title: Older guy seeks younger girlfriend (London)
case.text:
Hello all, im a 28 year old guy looking for a younger girlfriend, around 18-21, white, someone slim, under 5ft7, fun to be with, affectionate, intelligent, good sense of humour, loves tall and older guys, loyal and trustworthy, kind and caring, and has their own hobbies/interests.
Some more info about me: 6ft1, average build, blue eyes, short brown hair, nice smile, intelligent, charming, affectionate, good sense of humour, fun to be with, outgoing, open to new things, loyal and trustworthy. I enjoy hanging out with friends, going to the cinema, listening to music and a few other hobbies/interests. Also I enjoy holding hands, cuddles and cosy nights in snuggling on sofa, watching a Dvd :P
If interest then send me your pic and a message :)
Bye for now
x
